Text: Cher filmography:  She has also appeared in one starring theater role, numerous television commercials and directed a piece of the motion picture "If These Walls Could Talk" in 1996 and some of her music videos of the Geffen-era in late 1980s and in early 1990s.

Text: Cher filmography:  Cher has starred in various international television commercials, as well as high-profile print advertising for Lori Davis (1992).
